enchantment.astralenchant.mitigation_pie: Attacks with this item will penetrate various damage reductions.
enchantment.astralenchant.last_stand.des: Consume experience points to avoid death.
enchantment.astralenchant.item_protectio: Protects the item's components. Note: Durability is not protected.
enchantment.astralenchant.essence_of_enc: All stats of the item increase based on the total level of all other enchantments besides this one.
enchantment.astralenchant.cooldown_reduc: Reduces the cooldown for all items, such as Shields and Ender Pearls.
enchantment.astralenchant.adventurers_lo: Increase your luck based on the number of completed achievements.
enchantment.astralenchant.compatible.des: Enables any enchantment to be put on items.
enchantment.astralenchant.endless_appeti: Enhances natural regeneration and directly restores an amount equal to the excess over the cap of food-level and hidden saturation-level.
